name: AddDocumentToBoardByUrl
description:
Add a document to a Miro board using its URL.

This tool adds a document as an item to a specified Miro board by providing the document's URL. It's useful for organizing resources in a collaborative board. Requires 'boards:write' scope and observes Level 2 rate limiting.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the Miro board where the document will be added.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to create the item.

parameters.name: document_url
parameters.description: The URL where the document is hosted. This URL is required to add the document to the Miro board.

value_schema.description: URL where the document is hosted.

parameters.name: document_title
parameters.description: A short text header to identify the document added to the board.

value_schema.description: A short text header to identify the document.

parameters.name: position_x_coordinate
parameters.description: X-axis coordinate for placing the item on the board. Defaults to `0`. Center of board is `0`.

value_schema.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: y_axis_coordinate_on_board
parameters.description: Y-axis coordinate for placing the document on the Miro board. Defaults to `0`, where `0` is the center of the board.

value_schema.description:
Y-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: item_height_in_pixels
parameters.description: Specifies the height of the item on the board in pixels.

value_schema.description: Height of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: item_width_in_pixels
parameters.description: Specify the width of the document item on the board in pixels.

value_schema.description: Width of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: rotation_angle_degrees
parameters.description: Specify the rotation angle of the document item in degrees. Use positive values for clockwise rotation and negative for counterclockwise.

value_schema.description: Rotation angle of an item, in degrees, relative to the board. You can rotate items clockwise (right) and counterclockwise (left) by specifying positive and negative values, respectively.

parameters.name: parent_frame_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the parent frame for the document item on the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.
